Text: Thank you , once again you deliver the goods :) keep up the good work. Awesome!

It's awesome that you bring the show so quick, but haste makes waste, and by today's standards these are just crap.  Old school 4:3 ratio and x263 encoding which needs reformatting to play on any other device other than the PC - c'mon, I thought you were suppose to be a veteran at this.  I've been downloading stuff by you for a while, but no more because it is crap.  People like widescreen and like compatibility.  Sure, my versions takes a little longer to be upped, but by all means it's far better than what you bring.  It's sad people will settle for crap.

Probably doesn't work on the Xbox 360, either.  Surely doesn't playback on a PS3.
